translation.py¶

This module is to create the regions of the Translation.

Note: The comments are exactly the sames for each on of the types of data hierarchies.

class translation.CreateTransFile(filepath)[source]¶

Class responsible to retrieve the translations of each sentence from the Annotation Tree.

Methods

create_trans_xml()[source]¶

Creates an xml file with all the translations of the Annotation Tree file.

See also

poioapi.data
Here you can find more about the data

hierarchies.
